metadata.title: Angular NL
metadata.desc: Angular rises again, for a long time Angular has disappeared from the Tech Community in the Netherlands. As one of the World's most hyped and used frameworks we are proud to announce that Angular will be back in Amsterdam on the 8th of March 2019.

metadata.title: The Big Hangout 2019
metadata.desc: Angular stories, emerging techniques and proven approaches for Angular developers. This is a half-day and evening event for Angular community in Finland and international guests.

metadata.title: Angular + Truffle = Dapps
metadata.desc: Ng-Es 2019 is Angular workshop for teach about benefits of use angular to make scalable projects and dapps using ethereum and truffle and the best content in spanish soon in english and russian üòâüòâ .

metadata.title: NG Turkey Meetup
metadata.desc: NG Turkey Meetup is a monthly event full of Angular and technologies around it. This month's topics are "Angular CLI: The Hidden Force in Your Terminal" and "Implementing Atomic Design Principles in Angular Applications".

metadata.title: Angular Athens
metadata.desc: Angular is one of the most popular front-end frameworks and has a massive and active community around the world. The new version of Angular is here to stay and we want to build a community in Athens in order to explore the huge ecosystem around this framework, learn new things and share our knowledge and best practices about Angular and front end development in general. This meetup is for both newbies and experienced developers who want to be part of this community. We organize regularly scheduled meetings and of course we are open to new ideas for talks, for presenters and volunteers.

metadata.title: Angular Costa Rica Meetup
metadata.desc: Angular Costa Rica is a community that started two months ago. We're having our 2nd event, this time we've an international guess. Topics: "Advance Directives" and "Routing, Lazy loading resolver and guards"

metadata.title: The Future of Web apps using blockchain and Angular
metadata.desc: Ng-Es 2019 is Angular workshop in honduras during the tech event Honducamp.

metadata.title: Angular Academy @ngVikings
metadata.desc: Angular Academy is a full day intensive coding workshop for professional web developers! Learn Angular 8 and TypeScript Now in Copenhagen with this immersive instructor-led classroom training!

metadata.title: ngVikings
metadata.desc: ngVikings is a non-profit, non-commercial, 100% community-driven event comprised of many Nordic Angular groups with more than 3500 active members in total. Always having Angular team members, Google Developer Experts and legendary international speakers onboard, ngVikings Conference guarantees an excellent program: fresh, technically deep and 100% useful.

metadata.title: Angular Academy
metadata.desc: Angular Academy is a 3-day intensive coding workshop for web developers! Learn Angular 8 and TypeScript Now in Santo Domingo with this immersive instructor-led classroom training!

metadata.title: Angular.Schule
metadata.desc: Angular onsite training and public workshops from the authors of the German Angular book. In June we have another public workshop in Heidelberg. In 4 days we will teach you everything you need to know about Angular, RxJS and NgRx. (in German language)

metadata.title: Angular Day
metadata.desc: Angular Day is dedicated to developers and technical managers. Every year, you can learn about all the updates on Angular and the surrounding technologies, find new partners and get to know new employees.

metadata.title: Angular In Depth Conf
metadata.desc: The first and only conference in Kyiv dedicated to the best practices and trends of Angular.

metadata.title: ngSriLanka
metadata.desc: ngSriLanka 2019 is Sri Lanka's first ever Angular conference. It will be held in Colombo and organized by the enthusiastic, local Angular community with over 800 developers

metadata.title: ngDenver
metadata.desc: AngularDenver 2018 is Denver‚Äôs first all-day Angular conference! Angular developers from all across the country are coming to Denver, Colorado for a full day of keynote speakers and presentations on Friday, August 3rd. There will also be 2 days of pre-conference workshops, on Wednesday and Thursday, August 2nd and 3rd.

metadata.title: #ngHeidelberg v6 ‚Äì Angular Heidelberg Meetup
metadata.desc: Free coffee, pizza and a special guest. Heidelberg's 6th Angular meetup is coming. üöÄJoin us for a great talk üó£Ô∏è"Angular Performance: Your App at the Speed of Light", community updates and networking ü§ù. Our speaker and special guest is Christian Liebel who was awarded with the Microsoft MVP title.

metadata.title: NG-MY
metadata.desc: NG-MY 2019 is the first community-driven Angular conference in Southeast Asia. It will take place in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

metadata.title: ng-japan
metadata.desc: ng-japan is the largest Angular conference in Japan. It'll have talks with great speakers, including the Angular core team from Google.

metadata.title: Angular Lunch STL
metadata.desc: We meet at lunch time to talk about all things Angular. Usually one Wednesday per month. Come join us for presentations and deep Angular discussion. Lunch will be provided.

metadata.title: NG-DE
metadata.desc: NG-DE is the first community-driven Angular conference in Germany. We will run the opening event in Berlin, 30 & 31 August 2019. The venue BOLLE FESTS√ÑLE is located next to the beautiful river Spree, close to Bellevue palace and Tiergarten. A bunch of one-day workshops are planned for August 29 which can be booked separately.

metadata.title: ngTalks
metadata.desc: Join us in a quest of developing a brighter Angular community, attend NgTalks, the first of many conference dedicated to latest and greatest news and insights from the global Angular network, covering best practices, approaches and cutting-edge trends.

metadata.title: Angular Connect
metadata.desc: AngularConnect is Europe‚Äôs largest Angular conference - meet the Angular team, supercharge your apps, connect with the community, learn new skills & so much more!. You'll enjoy keynotes, live coding sessions, technical deep dives, hands-on mini-workshops & more, covering topics including Angular Ivy, performance, tooling, authentication, security, testing, accessibility, PWAs, & NgRx.

metadata.title: ngSpain
metadata.desc: ngSpain is the only Angular Conference in Spain. 2019 will be it's first eddition and will be held in the capital, Madrid. It is an event run by the community from the community, with organisers from all over Europe belonging to the Angular community.

metadata.title: NGRome
metadata.desc: For the first time ever, the biggest Italian Angular Conference is taking place at NG Rome MMXIX, this year on October 7th at the Teatro Manzoni in Rome, Italy

metadata.title: NG Honduras
metadata.desc: NG Honduras will be the first conference on Angular in Honduras, where national and international people will attend to share ideas, knowledge, experiences and create new connections.

metadata.title: ngTaiwan
metadata.desc: Angular Taiwan is an Angular community in Taiwan. We are welcome anyone to join us, and feel free to post and share any articles, courses, videos or any discussion that related to Angular.

metadata.title: NG-BE
metadata.desc: NG-BE 2019 is a 2-day event in Ghent, Belgium, that brings together Angular developers and experts from all over the world to share ideas, news and opinions about Angular.
